metadata.synopsis: The player encounters a group of kuo-toa, humanoid fish beings capable of creating gods just by imagining them. They're overzealous and easily duped, and are currently worshipping a murderous redcap they've mistaken for a god of murder. He's capitalising on the situation and very much enjoying the incredible power with which he's been invested. In this dialogue, we can deal with him as this great inscrutable power, or see through the situation and expose / do a deal with him. In all cases he's brash, offensive and generally gross.The all cap lines are BOOOAL in his fully powerful form.When we suddenly rever to lower caps, it's when we've forced him into his 'common' form.BOOOAL = Boo-AHHL (almost guttural)Kuo-Toa = Koo-oh-TO-ah
metadata.how_to_trigger: load WLD_Main_Agoto -418.88, 5.08, 271.47speak with the Priest KuoToa

14.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
14.text: Our blood to fill your oceans, oh blessed BOOOAL! Our bones to build your temple in the deep!
14.context: NodeContext: Fanatic devotion, speaking to the air/altar

136.speaker: Narrator
136.text: *A wave of pure devotion washes over you - and with every surge, you feel a presence grow in response.*

17.speaker: BOOOAL
17.text: WORDS, PRIEST. PROMISES. YOUR GOD WANTS PROOF. WANTS BLOOD.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: DISMISSIVE, IMPATIENT

115.speaker: Narrator
115.text: *These beings are kuo-toa - former mind flayer slaves that manifest their gods through sheer belief.*

142.context: CinematicNodeContext: The priest turns to spot the playerNodeContext: The priest turns to spot the player

26.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
26.text: YOU! Our Lord of Murder demands sacrifice! You will be an offering for the great god BOOOAL!

65.speaker: Player
65.text: You can give it a rest. Your 'god' isn't real.

103.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
103.context: NodeContext: Last thing he was expecting - taken slightly aback for a moment

111.speaker: Player
111.text: Bhaal is the true Lord of Murder. Perhaps I should offer you instead.

48.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
48.text: Bhaal...? No... we are... we are faithful to Lord BOOOAL...

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *You sense a flicker of doubt - brief, but enough. For an instant, the godly presence falters.*

90.speaker: BOOOAL
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in the process of reverting back to his common form. He is invisible for "NO! NO" and becomes visible for "Stop that!"NodeContext: Furious, panicked - his con is being exposed and he's losing power even as he speaks

104.speaker: Player
104.text: Murmur a prayer. Wherever you go, your god holds sway.

123.speaker: Player
123.text: He's a fabrication. Whatever you created him for, you don't need him.

40.speaker: BOOOAL
40.text: ARGH! NO! SHUT IT! Shut your rotten mouth!
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in the process of reverting back into his common form. He is invisible for the capitalised parts of this now, but then becomes visible for "Shut your rotten mouth"NodeContext: The lack of faith is literally draining power from him - sulky and furious all in one as he returns to his common form

152.speaker: Narrator
152.text: *You feel the presence waver - one moment a god of awesome power, the next... a common redcap.*

165.speaker: BOOOAL
165.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible, and he appears as a redacapNodeContext: Realising the game is up

33.speaker: BOOOAL
33.text: Don't do anything hasty, now. The fishfolk got plenty of power - we can share.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible, and appears as a common redcapNodeContext: Still annoyed with us but willing to make a deal. Only SLIGHTLY wheedling - redcaps aren't known for negotiating

27.speaker: BOOOAL
27.text: Shut it, you!  I'm talking to... my Chosen! Chosen got power - you want power, don't ya?
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible, and just appears as an ordinary redcapNodeContext: Shouting his high priest down - he wants to seal the deal with us before his idiot followers fully catch on

21.speaker: BOOOAL
21.text: That depends on the fishfolk, don't it? But plenty to go around.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He's no longer invisible and just appears as a common redcapNodeContext: Eyes wide, dropping hints and urging you to play along.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: I'll just kill you and claim it for myself.

135.speaker: BOOOAL
135.text: Kiss my arse. I'm the Lord of Murder - I'll show you why.
135.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible and appears as just a common redcapNodeContext: Aggressive - he tried to be reasonable, now he just wants to kill us for the pleasure of it

56.speaker: Player
56.text: [To priest] Well? Bow before BOOOAL's Chosen!

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *You feel a swell of power again as the creatures redouble their prayers.*

80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Kuotoa pray fervently as the redcap flickers out of existence, 'presence' returns.

141.speaker: BOOOAL
141.text: AH. BETTER. YOU ENT HALF-BAD - I THINK I'LL KEEP YOU.
141.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Releif and energy - his power is surging back into him. Last part is almost a pat on the head kind of affection

10.speaker: BOOOAL
10.text: GO THEN, CHOSEN. TELL THE SURFACE WORLD BOOOAL IS COMING. AND SO YOU DON'T FORGET -
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Grand, bold, trying to be an image of a powerful god

73.speaker: BOOOAL
73.text: HERE. THIS BLADE IS MY TONGUE - AND I WANT A TASTE OF EVERY LIFE YOU TAKE.
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Hint of warning.

138.speaker: BOOOAL
138.text: GO WITH MY BLESSING, CHOSEN. TELL THE WORLD THAT BOOOAL IS COMING. SHOW THEM MY POWER.
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Grand, bold, trying to be an image of a powerful god

69.speaker: BOOOAL
69.text: BUT CHOSEN... JUST DON'T FORGET WHERE YOU GOT IT FROM.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Hint of warning.

30.speaker: Narrator
30.text: *Mad guilt swills in your swooning, sick body. Today you became the tart of a false God, and your evil pride revolts.*

72.speaker: Player
72.text: I don't need your power - or theirs.

139.speaker: BOOOAL
139.text: Kiss my arse, then. This Lord of Murder likes doing his own dirty work.
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible and appears as just a common redcapNodeContext: Aggressive - he tried to be reasonable, now he just wants to kill us for the pleasure of it

164.speaker: BOOOAL
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Fanatical war cry

131.speaker: Player
131.text: I won't let you enslave them any longer.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: I need no god to claim my power. I will show them the way of my oath.

75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player looking obnoxiously high and mighty

92.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
92.text: Yes. Yes - I sense light. Love. A new god, to show us the way!

15.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
15.text: Yes. Yes - I sense justice. Honour. A new god, to show us the way!

71.speaker: BOOOAL
71.text: No, no, NO! I'm the Lord of Murder, ME!

107.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
107.text: Yes. Yes - I sense judgement. Retribution. A new god, to show us the way!
107.context: NodeContext: His psychic energy is picking up on our paladin oath - and he likes it

110.speaker: Player
110.text: LIAR. DESTROY THE PRETENDER GOD, MY CHOSEN!

125.context: CinematicNodeContext: The kuo toa look at the player, enthralled. The player points a hand at the red cap commandingly.

132.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
132.context: NodeContext: As if snapping out of a trance - shaking off doubt and getting angry at player

70.speaker: BOOOAL
70.text: YES, PRIEST. TRUST BOOOAL. THAT'UN'S A HERETIC - SO START CUTTING.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Smug, urging his priest on to bloodshed

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Look at me. If there's any god of death here, it's me.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: Seriously - 'BOOOAL'? Whatever this thing is, he didn't even feed you a good lie.

119.speaker: Player
119.text: I AM BOOOAL, LORD OF MURDER, VISCOUNT OF VIOLENCE. THIS ONE LIES.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: 'BOOOAL'? Bhaal is the god of murder.

63.speaker: BOOOAL
63.text: THAT SO, CUTLET? I'M A GOD, AND I FANCY A BIT OF MURDER. SIMPLE ENOUGH.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Snorting with laughter, dismissive - he wants slaughter, and no well-placed argument is going to sway him from it

95.speaker: BOOOAL
95.text: WELL IT ISN'T MURDER IF YOU'RE WILLING - IS IT, CUTLET?
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Air of 'D'UH!' about it

163.speaker: Player
163.text: Get your bearings. What have you stumbled in on?

66.speaker: Narrator
66.text: *That sickle blade - it's no religious totem. It belongs to a common redcap, fey creatures known for their bloodlust.*
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Feature a close-up of the sickle-blade S_Und_KuoToa_HighPriest is holding (branch checks to make sure he has it)

85.speaker: BOOOAL
85.text: WELL, PRIEST? BOOOAL WANTS A SACRIFICE! BOOOAL WANTS BLOOD.
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Impatient - his high priest is not acting swiftly enough for him, and the longer this goes on the more chance he'll be exposed

98.speaker: Player
98.text: Fool. I kill in my sleep. If you seek death, death itself is here.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Wait! If it's blood you want, I can make another offer.

44.speaker: BOOOAL
44.text: OH? WHAT'S THAT, THEN? WHAT YOU GOT FOR BLESSED BOOOAL?
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Waiting to be impressed, smugly certain that we can't

81.speaker: BOOOAL
81.text: OH? WHAT'S THAT, THEN? SEE YOU GOT MEAT TO SPARE.
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Piqued his interest - he's taken an interest in one of our companions

137.speaker: BOOOAL
137.text: WHAT YOU GOT FOR BLESSED BOOOAL?
137.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Tone of 'impress me'

53.speaker: Player
53.text: You want me to sacrifice one of my friends?

64.speaker: Lae'zel
64.text: You wouldn't dare betray a child of Gith on the whims of this web-toed wonder.

24.speaker: Karlach
24.text: Don't look at me. I just got out of devil hell. I'm not going to fishy hell any time soon.

116.speaker: Astarion
116.text: I want to wake up beside a handsome virgin every morning, but life doesn't give us what we want. Can we kill this 'god' now?
116.context: NodeContext: Tired of this conversation. A 'God' (who's clearly some mouthy git pretending to be a god) has just told the player he wants them to sacrifice you. You're not impressed.

112.speaker: Wyll
112.text: Don't be rash, now. I may be tolerant, but I won't let myself be fed to the fishes.

25.speaker: Gale
25.text: Tread carefully, now. Not even a god would survive sacrificing me.

18.speaker: BOOOAL
18.text: IT'S SIMPLE. MAKE AN OFFERING - OR BECOME ONE.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

58.speaker: Astarion
58.text: What? You're bowing to this gutter-throated idol?
58.context: NodeContext: Disbelief, Players have betrayed Astarion

60.speaker: Astarion
60.text: You wretched little worm. I'll show you murder worthy of a god!
60.context: NodeContext: Players have betrayed Astarion and he's about to attack them.

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.text: You can sacrifice yourself first, you spineless rat!

67.speaker: Karlach
67.text: Godsdammit soldier, I trusted you! And now I have to kill you and all these weird fish lads. Ugh!
67.context: NodeContext: Super frustrated the player is trying to sacrifice her to some fish people

78.speaker: Wyll
78.text: So it's like that, is it? So be it - the Blade does not yield!

54.speaker: Gale
54.text: Not treading carefully, then? Out with a bang it is.
54.context: NodeContext: The last line can be said with some fierceness. You're about to go into combat.

79.speaker: BOOOAL
79.text: GONNA BREAK YOU UNDER MY BOOTS! GONNA BATHE IN YOUR BLOOD!
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

87.speaker: Player
87.text: I have only one life. But I can kill many more in your name.

122.speaker: BOOOAL
122.text: THAT SOUNDS LIKE A LOT MORE BLOOD. A LOT MORE MESS. GOOD.
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Considering, approving, bare quavering of excitement

155.speaker: BOOOAL
155.text: OH, DON'T WORRY. REST O' THE WORLD WILL KNOW ME SOON ENOUGH.
155.context: NodeContext: Smug, uninterested - he's all powerful, and doesn't need us

145.speaker: BOOOAL
145.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Devious, looking forward to killing us

62.speaker: Player
62.text: The mercy of a quick death.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Redcaps love violence - bait him with an exaggerated tale of battle and bloodshed.

100.speaker: BOOOAL
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Getting lost in the pure joy of the slaughter

149.speaker: Narrator
149.text: *In the outburst of emotion, you feel the divine presence falter - then revert to its basic, cruel nature.*

101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Redcap forgets himself in his bloodlust, pops back into visibility.NodeContext: Redcap forgets himself in his bloodlust, pops back into visibility.

0.speaker: BOOOAL
0.text: TALK IS FINE. TASTE IS BETTER. PRIEST!
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Dismissive of our stories, wants to get straight to killing - calling to his priest to attack us

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Are your followers aware you're just a rabid little fey creature?

160.speaker: BOOOAL
160.text: LITTLE?! I'M A GOD. AND I'M GONNA RIP YOU - TEAR YOU - WEAR YOU FOR A HAT -
160.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Furious - he is an actual fact VERY little, and goes a bit rabid when insulted

133.speaker: BOOOAL
133.text: OI, PRIEST! YOU GONNA LET THIS'UN GIVE CHEEK TO YOUR GOD?
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Barking to his priest to get ready to attack us

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Try to determine who - or what - they're talking to.

117.speaker: Narrator
117.text: *This presence... the magic is not divine, but fey. And it is murderous.*

106.speaker: Player
106.text: Think back to your studies of kuo-toa and their gods for any useful information.

89.speaker: Narrator
89.text: *'Boooal' is not a recorded kuo-toa god, but the species is susceptible to mind control and trickery. This wouldn't be their first pretender god.*

148.speaker: Player
148.text: YOU ARE LISTENING TO A FALSEHOOD. HE IS NOT YOUR REAL GOD.

166.speaker: Narrator
166.text: *You don't recognise the creatures - but this voice seems to have a hold over them.*

29.speaker: BOOOAL
29.text: YOU'VE MADE YOUR OFFERING. EVEN BETTER - YOU MADE A MESS.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

50.speaker: BOOOAL
50.text: I THINK I'LL KEEP YOU - CHOSEN.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

109.speaker: BOOOAL
109.text: GO WITH MY BLESSING - SHOW THE WORLD THE POWER OF BOOOAL!
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

9.speaker: BOOOAL
9.text: AND CHOSEN... SO YOU DON'T FORGET-
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

39.speaker: BOOOAL
39.text: DON'T WANT PRAYERS FROM YOU, CHOSEN - WANT BLOOD. ON YOU GO.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: We've returned to speak to BOOOAL after he's dismissed us to go kill in his name.
